snippet: The Patriots dominated offensively with Rob Gronkowski and Aaron Hernandez, but they do not have any other tight ends on the active roster.
abstract: The Patriots dominated offensively with Rob Gronkowski and Aaron Hernandez, but they do not have any other tight ends on the active roster.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS -- If Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski can't play in Super Bowl XLVI because of a high ankle sprain, there might not be anyone to fill his shoes.

headline.main: Patriots May Be Caught in a Tight Spot
